dialogue.speaker: NPC 1
dialogue.text: I'm here to help. What's your name?

dialogue.speaker: Main Character
dialogue.text: My name is Eryndor Thorne. I've been having some... strange occurrences.

dialogue.speaker: NPC 1
dialogue.text: Strange occurrences? What kind of things have you seen?

dialogue.speaker: Main Character
dialogue.text: I've been seeing dark figures lurking around my house at night. And hearing whispers in the walls.
